law.catch_line: Quarterly reports of assets and liabilities.
law.text: On a quarterly basis, the manager shall prepare a report of assets and liabilities, which shall also include a statement of condition regarding the solvency of the authority when awarded claims to date, and estimated initial claims not reported, are taken into account. This report shall be a public record and shall be provided to the board, the Governor, and the Legislative Research Commission.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 181, Part 12, sec. 49, effective April 4, 1994.
